```{r setup}
library(mhcnuggetsr)
```

For this vignette, we use the same example as the MHCnuggets
Python notebooks.

```{r}
if (is_mhcnuggets_installed()) {
  peptides_path <- get_example_filename("test_peptides.peps")
}
```

```
if (is_mhcnuggets_installed()) {
  epitope_predict(
    class_='I',
    peptides_path = peptides_path, 
    mhc='HLA-A02:01'
  )
}
```


```
if (is_mhcnuggets_installed()) {
  epitope_predict(
    class_='I',
    peptides_path = peptides_path, 
    mhc='HLA-A02:01', 
    ba_models=True
  )
}
```

```
if (is_mhcnuggets_installed()) {
  epitope_predict(
    class_='II',
    peptides_path = peptides_path, 
    mhc='HLA-DRB101:01'
  )
}
```

```
if (is_mhcnuggets_installed()) {
  epitope_predict(
    class_='I',
    peptides_path = peptides_path, 
    mhc='HLA-A02:60'
  )
}
```
